items.title: Earnings season is winding down, and these S&P 500 companies have hiked their dividends
items.description: Stocks are in a rocky patch, but a few companies are announcing dividend increases — and that's great news for income investors.

items.title: State Street, Apollo team up to launch first of its kind private credit ETF
items.description: Wall Street is eager to provide access to private equity and credit to the masses, and ETFs are the obvious wrapper.

items.title: How to produce income from Nvidia while waiting for a rebound
items.description: Jeff Kilburg describes selling a put spread in the AI stock leader.

items.title: The ‘White House put': February’s rough stock market could keep Trump in check
items.description: Trump could use fiscal stimulus as a boost should his tariffs threaten economic growth.

items.title: Here are the other stocks forming the ‘death cross’ following Microsoft this week
items.description: A "death cross" occurs when a stock's 50-day moving average slips below its downward-trending 200-day counterpart.
